puzzle.help: 1. Make Cappuccino by linking each cup to one or more coffee beans and cows. 2. Links must be straight lines, not crossing each other. 3. To each cup there must be linked an equal number of beans and cows. At least one of each. 4. When linking multiple beans and cows, you can also link cows to cows and beans to beans, other than linking them to the cup.
